sentence: If a person has a heart attack, firstly call the emergency number. Secondly, help him in sitting or lying down. Thirdly, give him an aspirin pill to chew or swallow.

sentence: What is the difference between primary brain tumor and metastatic (secondary) brain tumor?

sentence: If a person has a heart attack, firstly call the emergency number. Secondly, help him in sitting or lying down. Thirdly, give him an aspirin pill to chew or swallow.
